common_1190_hakase_01a: Human presence detected within the Zero Lab.[npcn:B]
common_1190_hakase_01b: Human presence detected within the Zero Lab.[npcn:E]
common_1190_hakase_05a:
That one is far less tractable and far more
aggressive than the one you’ve traveled with.[npcn:B]
common_1190_hakase_05b:
That one is far less tractable and far more
aggressive than the one you’ve traveled with.[npcn:E]
common_1190_hakase_06a:
Your Koraidon fled Area Zero because it lost to
the other one in a territorial struggle.[npcn:B]
common_1190_hakase_06b:
Your Miraidon fled Area Zero because it lost to
the other one in a territorial struggle.[npcn:E]
common_1190_hakase_07a:
I’m afraid that there is something for which I
must apologize.[npcn:B]
common_1190_hakase_07b:
I’m afraid that there is something for which I
must apologize.[npcn:E]
common_1190_hakase_08a: I am not the true Professor Sada.[npcn:B]
common_1190_hakase_08b: I am not the true Professor Turo.[npcn:E]
common_1190_hakase_09a:
I am an artificial intelligence the professor
created, imbued with her memories and\r
knowledge. In short, I am an AI-powered robot.[npcn:B]
common_1190_hakase_09b:
I am an artificial intelligence the professor
created, imbued with his memories and\r
knowledge. In short, I am an AI-powered robot.[npcn:E]
common_1190_hakase_10a:
The real professor passed away during the
incident that destroyed Research Station No. 4.[npcn:C]
common_1190_hakase_10b:
The real professor passed away during the
incident that destroyed Research Station No. 4.[npcn:F]
common_1190_hakase_11a:
The Pokémon was not to be blamed. It was the
original professor who failed to accurately judge\r
its full power.[npcn:C]
common_1190_hakase_11b:
The Pokémon was not to be blamed. It was the
original professor who failed to accurately judge\r
its full power.[npcn:F]
common_1190_hakase_12a:
I believe the professor wanted nothing more than
for the Koraidon to survive and thrive.\c
That is why she threw herself in front of your
Koraidon in an attempt to protect it.[npcn:C]
common_1190_hakase_12b:
I believe the professor wanted nothing more than
for the Miraidon to survive and thrive.\c
That is why he threw himself in front of your
Miraidon in an attempt to protect it.[npcn:F]
common_1190_hakase_13a:
From the time I first reached out to Director
Clavell and asked to be put in contact with you...\r
I was never more than an AI.[npcn:C]
common_1190_hakase_13b:
From the time I first reached out to Director
Clavell and asked to be put in contact with you...\r
I was never more than an AI.[npcn:F]
